arabic.title: We Dah Ma32ol
text: we da ma32ol akhasamak 7ata law leila
tehon ro7y fadak w ro7y wala han 7oby lek
dana law a2ol ba7ebak 3aiza kam leila
da kefaya ya 7abiby ana law a3esh 3omry lek
wady 2albi gaylak 3ashe2 tany ta3ala 7abiby
da 7aram nedaya3 men 7aiatana law sawany
wady 2albi gaylak 3ashe2 tany ta3ala 7abiby
da 7aram nedaya3 men 7aiatana law sawany
wana wayak fe 7odnak bansa doniaia
ba3esh donia gher el donia wana leya eh gher hawak
ana 3ash2ak w 7obak lesa gowaya
w men leila ya 7abiby khalas 3aisha 3shan hawak
wady 2albi gaylak 3ashe2 tany ta3ala 7abiby
da 7aram nedaya3 men 7aiatana law sawany
wady 2albi gaylak 3ashe2 tany ta3ala 7abiby
da 7aram nedaya3 men 7aiatana law sawany
wady 2albi gaylak 3ashe2 tany ta3ala 7abiby
da 7aram nedaya3 men 7aiatana law sawany
wady 2albi gaylak 3ashe2 tany ta3ala 7abiby
da 7aram nedaya3 men 7aiatana law sawany
7abiby da 7aram nedaya3 men 7aiatna w law sawany

english.title: is that possible
text: is it possible for me to argue with you even one night
my life is a sacrifice for you ,i don't want to sacrifice my love for you
if i say i love you it will take me a whole night
it's enough for me baby if i live my life for you
here is my heart coming to you in love ,come dear
it's s uch a pity that we waste even seconds from our lives
here is my heart coming to you in love ,come dear
it's s uch a pity that we waste even seconds from our lives
when i'm whith you in your arms i forget the world
i live the life one of its kind ,what do i have but yur love
i love you and ur love is still inside me
who do i have baby?that's it i'm living to love you
here is my heart coming to you in love ,come dear
it's s uch a pity that we waste even seconds from our lives
here is my heart coming to you in love ,come dear
it's s uch a pity that we waste even seconds from our lives
here is my heart coming to you in love ,come dear
it's s uch a pity that we waste even seconds from our lives
here is my heart coming to you in love ,come dear
it's s uch a pity that we waste even seconds from our lives
baby it's s uch a pity that we waste even seconds from our lives

arabic.title: انساني
text: قول ان انا خنت وبعتك
وحلمنا مش باقيه عليه
قول اني مرتاحة لبعدك
والحب عمري ما حسيت بيه
جيه وقتها علشان تعرف
ان الحياة يوم ليك وعليك
واللي قسيته زمان منك
ودلوقتي عايشه وبتقاسيه
X2
انساني وعيش حياتك من تاني
ما لقيتش في الحب مكاني
حتقولي ايه وانا قلبي فيه
من جرحك انت اللي يكفيه
X2
احسن تروح وما تسالنيش
عن اللي كان وعن الاحلام
سنين معاك وما حسيتنيش
وحبنا كان بس كلام
ولا فيه مكان علشان ترجع
ولا باقى حاجة بتنده ليك
مهما تقول انا مش بسمع
ولا قادرة اعيش احساس في عنيك
X2
انساني وعيش حياتك من تاني
ما لقيتش في الحب مكاني
حتقولي ايه وانا قلبي فيه
من جرحك انت اللي يكفيه
X2

english.title: Forget Me
text: Say that I betrayed and gave up on you
And I didn’t care about our love anymore
Say that I am relaxed being far from you
And that I never felt love
The time has come for you to know
That everyone has good and bad days
The things I suffered in the past because of you
Are what you are experiencing and suffering from now
X2
Forget me and live your life anew
I didn’t find my place in love
What will you tell me when my heart has
Had enough of your pain
X2
It’s better if you go and don’t ask me
About what was and about the dreams
In the years I was with you, you never recognized my feelings
And our love was just talk
There is no place for you to come back to
And nothing is left to call you back
It doesn’t matter what you say; I won’t hear
And I am not able to feel anything when I’m with you
X2
Forget me and live your life anew
I didn’t find my place in love
What will you tell me when my heart has
Had enough of your pain
X2
